JobTitle: Experienced Electronics Packaging Design & Analysis Engineer
JobFullDesc: Job DescriptionAt Boeing, we innovate and collaborate to make the world a better place. From the seabed to outer space, you can contribute to work that matters with a company where diversity, equity and inclusion are shared values. We’re committed to fostering an environment for every teammate that’s welcoming, respectful and inclusive, with great opportunity for professional growth. Find your future with us.The Boeing Defense, Space and Security, Space and Launch division is seeking an Experienced Electronics Packaging Design & Analysis Engineer (level 3)to provide support to the Electronic Products team located in El Segundo, CA. Part of Boeing Space and Launch, the Electronic Products team manages the electronic products within the company's major commercial and government satellite and ground programs for communications and national defense, as well as within the company’s other programs across the world, including commercial and government avionics, space exploration, and multiple defense vehicles. Position Overview:The Experienced Electronics Packaging Design & Analysis Engineer coordinates with various other engineering and non-engineering groups in order to analyze customer and system requirements to develop basic architectural approaches and detailed specifications for various electronic products, as well as to develop high-level and detailed designs consistent with requirements and specifications.  This position validates designs through various methods of review, testing, and analysis, and identifies, tracks, and statuses technical performance metrics to measure progress and ensure compliance with requirements. The analytical methods used include finite element models/simulations and hand calculations, which are done throughout the product life-cycle. Additionally, this position supports Supplier Management with make/buy recommendations and other technical services of limited scope, provides engineering support throughout the lifecycle of the product, and investigates emerging technologies to develop concepts for future product designs to meet projected requirements. This position also supports knowledge sharing within and across teams and develops new processes and process improvements to reduce cycle time, continuously innovate on the products and processes, and
